questions.question: Considering the overall rectangular layout and the clearly defined sections detailing nutritional information per serving, what is the dominant shape of this food label?

Observing the color palette, which primary color is most prominently used in this product's nutrition facts label design?
Analyzing the visual presentation, what is the primary font style used in displaying the various nutritional values and descriptions on this food label?
What is the primary material the label appears to be printed on, given its relatively smooth and untextured appearance?
Focusing on the textual content, what specific dietary component is prominently featured and measured in grams?
What is the predominant color used for the headers and subheadings within the various nutritional information categories on this label?
Examining the arrangement of text and data, what is the overarching organizational principle that structures the content of this nutritional information panel?
Considering the information provided, what crucial vitamin's percentage daily value is prominently displayed on this label’s lower section?
Observing the text size and font weight, what is the size and weight of the text used for the primary heading indicating the information's purpose?
What key mineral’s daily percentage value is prominently displayed within the provided information?

What single-word descriptor best captures the overall visual style of this food label's design and text presentation?
